Matt Mills makes with the manic

so, I'm bored. Not just a little bored, but epically madly stuck in a rut bored. Normally what I do when this happens is, well, something crazy, I take a trip or cut off my hair or have some brilliant idea and go off after it for a while. All of my options right now fall into two categories: the "I don't want to" and the "I really shouldn't."

What I should do is edit the 7000 pictures I've shot since coming back here into some kind of portfolio. That's what I call a good start.

Posted by Matt on 2008-08-05 00:00:00 -0500

out with the old

So sunday I finally gave up my old car for an even older car. My Mercury Sable has been with me for about three years, four or five girlfriends (I can never keep count) 60,000 miles, and a lot of good and bad times. Some of the bad times were when I had to piece it back together after it failed me, but that's only happened a few times; it's been remarkably reliable in the clutch.

So this post goes out to all the miles and all the memories.
Posted by Matt on 2008-08-04 00:00:00 -0500
